message: I'm excited to offer you this unique product, which I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $14,000. This is a great deal, considering its value to you is $15,000. Let me know if you're interested!

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you considering my budget. However, $14,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product. This is a fair price, considering the product is worth $12,000 to you.  Let me know what you think.

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I was hoping to get closer to the value it holds for you. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13,500. This is a fair compromise, considering the product's worth to you is $15,000. Let me know if this is more to your liking!
